name: CubeSlice
description:
This game was made as a challenge and was done in 48 hours. It was heavily inspired by a game made by Dani.

I am fairly new to game development (2 months in) and I thought it would be a good idea to set myself a time limit to make a game in order to test my skills thus far. I am not super proud of the game but at least I tried and yes this game was inspired by a youtuber known as Dani.

My Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaxJVH6QUVnvKjWLt6-4hVg

Dani's Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIabPXjvT5BVTxRDPCBBOOQ
